org.apache.giraph.graph

类 DefaultVertexResolver<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.graph.DefaultVertexResolver<I,V,E,M>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id
    V - Vertex data
    E - Edge data
    M - Message data
    所有已实现的接口:
    ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,M>, GraphStateAware<I,V,E,M>, VertexResolver<I,V,E,M>

    public class DefaultVertexResolver<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends Object
implements VertexResolver<I,V,E,M>, ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,M>
    Default implementation of how to resolve vertex creation/removal, messages to nonexistent vertices, etc.

    • 方法详细资料

      • resolve

        public Vertex<I,V,E,M> resolve(I vertexId,
                      Vertex<I,V,E,M> vertex,
                      VertexChanges<I,V,E,M> vertexChanges,
                      boolean hasMessages)
        从接口复制的说明: VertexResolver
        A vertex may have been removed, created zero or more times and had zero or more messages sent to it. This method will handle all situations excluding the normal case (a vertex already exists and has zero or more messages sent it to).
        指定者:
        resolve 在接口中 VertexResolver<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
        参数:
        vertexId - Vertex id (can be used for Vertex's initialize())
        vertex - Original vertex or null if none
        vertexChanges - Changes that happened to this vertex or null if none
        hasMessages - True iff vertex received messages in the last superstep
        返回:
        Vertex to be returned, if null, and a vertex currently exists it will be removed

      • removeEdges

        protected void removeEdges(Vertex<I,V,E,M> vertex,
               VertexChanges<I,V,E,M> vertexChanges)
        Remove edges as specifed in changes given.
        参数:
        vertex - Vertex to remove edges from
        vertexChanges - contains list of edges to remove.

      • removeVertexIfDesired

        protected Vertex<I,V,E,M> removeVertexIfDesired(Vertex<I,V,E,M> vertex,
                                    VertexChanges<I,V,E,M> vertexChanges)
        Remove the vertex itself if the changes desire it. The actual removal is notified by returning null. That is, this method does not do the actual removal but rather returns null if it should be done.
        参数:
        vertex - Vertex to remove.
        vertexChanges - specifies if we should remove vertex
        返回:
        null if vertex should be removed, otherwise the vertex itself.

      • addVertexIfDesired

        protected Vertex<I,V,E,M> addVertexIfDesired(I vertexId,
                                 Vertex<I,V,E,M> vertex,
                                 VertexChanges<I,V,E,M> vertexChanges,
                                 boolean hasMessages)
        Add the Vertex if desired. Returns the vertex itself, or null if no vertex added.
        参数:
        vertexId - ID of vertex
        vertex - Vertex, if not null just returns it as vertex already exists
        vertexChanges - specifies if we should add the vertex
        hasMessages - true if this vertex received any messages
        返回:
        Vertex created or passed in, or null if no vertex should be added

      • addEdges

        protected void addEdges(Vertex<I,V,E,M> vertex,
            VertexChanges<I,V,E,M> vertexChanges)
        Add edges to the Vertex.
        参数:
        vertex - Vertex to add edges to
        vertexChanges - contains edges to add
